name: Select
description: A simple dropdown component that allows you to select an option from a list.

props.name: selectedOption
props.description: The currently selected option of the dropdown.

props.name: onChange
props.description: Callback function when the selected option changes.

props.name: placeholder
props.description: Placeholder text displayed when no option is selected.

props.name: disabled
props.description: If true, the dropdown will be disabled.
